{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Tumara |image = Portrait Tumara Convo.png |image2 = PE2_Tumara.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Coastal |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 6 |MIG = 12 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 90 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 35 / 35 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 35 |fortitude = 34 |reflex = 47 |will = 35 |dr = 3 |ability = [Towering Physique](/toweringPhysiqueDeadfire/), [Sneak Attack](/sneakAttackDeadfire/), [Backstab](/backstabDeadfire/), [Crippling Strike](/cripplingStrikeDeadfire/), [Escape](/escapeDeadfire/), [Blinding Strike](/blindingStrikeDeadfire/), [Strike the Bell](/strikeTheBell/) |location = [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/)
[The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/) |quests = [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Rauatai Hat |body = Rauatai Clothing |internalname = NPC_Tumara |guid = 68ab962e-f146-4544-833e-86b09e80763f }} '''Tumara''' is a character in {{poe2}}. She stands outside of Arkemyr's Manor in [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/), and then in front of the [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/) at [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/) after starting [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/). ## Background Tumara is a Rauataian sailor who came to Arkemyr to negotiate for a Huana tablet, the Harapo Epic, in order to reclaim it for Rauatai. She helps to finance some of the Rauataian expeditions around the isles, and as such has an ear close to the ground. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [The Archmage's Vault](/theArchmagesVault/): Tumara wants to get her hands on the [Harapo Epic](/harapoEpic/) for the [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/). She believes it may help lead the RDC to [Ukaizo](/ukaizo/), and gives you a few clues on how you may obtain the tablet. ## Gallery PE2 Tumara and Netehe.png | In front of [Arkemyr's Manor](/arkemyrsManor/) [Category:Periki's Overlook characters](/categoryPerikisOverlookCharacters/) [Category:The Brass Citadel characters](/categoryTheBrassCitadelCharacters/)

{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Tumara |image = Portrait Tumara Convo.png |image2 = PE2_Tumara.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Coastal |gender = Female |culture = [[Deadfire Archipelago]] |background = |faction = [[Royal Deadfire Company]] |deity = |personality = |class = Rogue |level = 6 |MIG = 12 |CON = 10 |DEX = 11 |PER = 10 |INT = 10 |RES = 10 |health = 90 |damage = 5-8 {{crush}} / 5-8 {{crush}} |accuracy = 35 / 35 |penetration = 7 / 7 |deflection = 35 |fortitude = 34 |reflex = 47 |will = 35 |dr = 3 |ability = [[Towering Physique (Deadfire)|Towering Physique]], [[Sneak Attack (Deadfire)|Sneak Attack]], [[Backstab (Deadfire)|Backstab]], [[Crippling Strike (Deadfire)|Crippling Strike]], [[Escape (Deadfire)|Escape]], [[Blinding Strike (Deadfire)|Blinding Strike]], [[Strike the Bell]] |location = [[Periki's Overlook]]
[[The Brass Citadel]] |quests = [[The Archmage's Vault]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |head = Rauatai Hat |body = Rauatai Clothing |internalname = NPC_Tumara |guid = 68ab962e-f146-4544-833e-86b09e80763f }} '''Tumara''' is a character in {{poe2}}. She stands outside of Arkemyr's Manor in [[Periki's Overlook]], and then in front of the [[Imperial Command]] at [[The Brass Citadel]] after starting [[The Archmage's Vault]]. ==Background== Tumara is a Rauataian sailor who came to Arkemyr to negotiate for a Huana tablet, the Harapo Epic, in order to reclaim it for Rauatai. She helps to finance some of the Rauataian expeditions around the isles, and as such has an ear close to the ground. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [[The Archmage's Vault]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[The Archmage's Vault]]: Tumara wants to get her hands on the [[Harapo Epic]] for the [[Royal Deadfire Company]]. She believes it may help lead the RDC to [[Ukaizo]], and gives you a few clues on how you may obtain the tablet. ==Gallery== PE2 Tumara and Netehe.png | In front of [[Arkemyr's Manor]] [[Category:Periki's Overlook characters]] [[Category:The Brass Citadel characters]]
title: Tumara
